entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump The insanity is in the White House. It’s stunning that an elected representative (1) thinks the Administration’s response to COVID-19 has been anywise acceptable; (2) thinks we shouldn’t learn why the response was so damn awful; and (3) wants to cover up for this shitshow.
